page.title: 18VILLAGE CHANGES since 1900.
page.content: have someone who belongs to a SPORTS CLUB. 58 homes have someone who belongs to a village organisation.e.g.W.I.,Over 60's Club, British Legion,Drama Group. 6a.VISITS TO THE CINEMA.No homes attend weekly, one home attends monthly and 63 homes rarely attend. 6b.VISITS TO THE THEATRE.No homes attend weekly,7homes attend monthly and 61 homes rarely attend. 6c.ATTEND THEIR LOCAL CHURCH. 18 attend weekly,23 attend monthly and 38 rarely attend. 6d.VISIT TO A LOCAL PUBLIC HOUSE. 33 weekly,12 monthly and 41 rarely. Village life has seen many changes this century.These last 15 years in Abberley,mainly due to high property prices,there is a high rate of "new" families living here.The grown-up families of the old villagers just
